OpenHandTemple_Tombstone02.synopsis: Tomb 02 in Open Hand Temple Graveyard

EventPoster_SharessCaress_0.speaker: Narrator
EventPoster_SharessCaress_0.text: *Cabaret here, featuring Rhol, the Despoiler! The highest kicks in Baldur's Gate, guaranteed!*

CarmsGarmHangingBlackboard_0.speaker: Narrator
CarmsGarmHangingBlackboard_0.text: *Repairs and alterations available. Note - clothing from Facemaker Fashion is not accepted. I don't have time for hopeless garments.*

GortashOfficeBustPlaque_06_0.speaker: Narrator
GortashOfficeBustPlaque_06_0.text: *This is a bust of the god Bane as he first appeared to Gortash in dreams, and was then described to a Rivington sculptor.*

OpenHandTemple_Tombstone01_0.speaker: Narrator
OpenHandTemple_Tombstone01_0.text: *Domenek Sunny. Lost himself to addiction but found peace in Ilmater.*

BlackboardPotionShop04_0.speaker: Narrator
BlackboardPotionShop04_0.text: *Don't know your weavemoss from your mugwort? Don't be shy, the ever stylish Horst is at your service!*

RefugeeCampDonationDriveBlackboard_0.speaker: Narrator
RefugeeCampDonationDriveBlackboard_0.text: *Attention! Donations desperately needed for refugees. Every copper helps!*

BlacksmithShopHangingBlackboard_0.speaker: Narrator
BlacksmithShopHangingBlackboard_0.text: *Flaming Fist - please speak to Blaze Portyr to avail of a special discount in thanks for your service.*

BlackBoardDanthelonVelvetine_0.speaker: Narrator
BlackBoardDanthelonVelvetine_0.text: *Downstairs: Danthelon's Dancing Axe. Upstairs: The Velveteen Elixir.*

CarmsGarmMiniStandingBlackboard_0.speaker: Narrator
CarmsGarmMiniStandingBlackboard_0.text: *Mulworm cendal, Icewind Dale strandling, and hoard scarab dye now on sale.*

SharessCaressElminsterLibraryPlaque_0.speaker: Narrator
SharessCaressElminsterLibraryPlaque_0.text: *Moan loudly in the library at all times!*

BlackboardPotionShop02_0.speaker: Narrator
BlackboardPotionShop02_0.text: *A potion a day keeps Kelemvor away!*

Blackboard_BridgeBlackboard_0.speaker: Narrator
Blackboard_BridgeBlackboard_0.text: *Steel Watchers in operation during the coronation of Lord Gortash. Please refrain from criminal activity, and be courteous to the Flaming Fists.*

OpenHandTemple_Tombstone07_0.speaker: Narrator
OpenHandTemple_Tombstone07_0.text: *Bea Gardenson. Gave her life protecting fellow refugees. May the One Who Endures shelter her.*

Blackboard_DanthelonDancingAxe_002_0.speaker: Narrator
Blackboard_DanthelonDancingAxe_002_0.text: *Limited edition adventuring starter packs are currently out of stock. We apologise for any inconvenience caused.*

Blackboard_DanthelonDancingAxe_003_0.speaker: Narrator
Blackboard_DanthelonDancingAxe_003_0.text: *Every weapon, scroll, and elixir is crafted to the highest adventuring standards - and that's a Danthelon guarantee.*

OpenHandTemple_Tombstone06_0.speaker: Narrator
OpenHandTemple_Tombstone06_0.text: *Alvynn 'Muffle' Fieldwick. Gave his fortune to the poor. Died in the arms of friends. He will be missed.*

GortashOfficeBustPlaque_01_0.speaker: Narrator
GortashOfficeBustPlaque_01_0.text: *First of the Bormul patriar family to start his own venture, Alec is the unscrupulous bastard who made their fortune in mines and vineyards.*

Blackboard_SharessCaress_01_0.speaker: Narrator
Blackboard_SharessCaress_01_0.text: *Welcome to Sharess' Caress - where our libations and sensual indulgences restore even the weariest souls.*

FlophouseBlackboard_0.speaker: Narrator
FlophouseBlackboard_0.text: *Fraygo's Flophouse. Enter as strangers, leave as friends. No vacancies at this time.*

BlackboardPotionShop03_0.speaker: Narrator
BlackboardPotionShop03_0.text: *The Velveteen Elixir cannot be held liable for accidents resulting from the improper brewing of alchemical solutions.*

CarmsGarmMiniHangingBlackboard_0.speaker: Narrator
CarmsGarmMiniHangingBlackboard_0.text: *Note to self - restock Ten Towns taffeta, and find an additional leather supplier. Incoming war = increased Flaming Fist orders.*

OpenHandTemple_Tombstone09_0.speaker: Narrator
OpenHandTemple_Tombstone09_0.text: *Nallo Esi. Grief and illness laid ruin, yet her heart held only compassion. The Broken God be with her.*

OpenHandTemple_Tombstone05_0.speaker: Narrator
OpenHandTemple_Tombstone05_0.text: *Millie Runbarrel. Killed by the cult of the Absolute. May Our Martyred Father shelter her.*

GortashOfficeBustPlaque_02_0.speaker: Narrator
GortashOfficeBustPlaque_02_0.text: *Baldur's Gate ship captain Morgan Redlocks wed a man thrice her age. After the wedding, the groom suffered a heart attack. Redlocks converted his merchant ships into a pirate fleet.*

Blackboard_SharessCaress_02_0.speaker: Narrator
Blackboard_SharessCaress_02_0.text: *From decadent drow to whip-cracking librarians, we cater to all tastes. See Mamzell Amira for a full list of company.*

Blackboard_SharessCaress_03_0.speaker: Narrator
Blackboard_SharessCaress_03_0.text: *Try Hoots' Hooch now - a once-in-a-lifetime booze extravaganza!*

GortashOfficeBustPlaque_03_0.speaker: Narrator
GortashOfficeBustPlaque_03_0.text: *Carric started from nothing, built a financial empire and founded the Counting House. He refused to mingle with the other patriars, saying, "They didn't want me when I was an urchin, and now they can't have me."*

OpenHandTemple_Tombstone04_0.speaker: Narrator
OpenHandTemple_Tombstone04_0.text: *Unknown Child and her dog, who stood watch over her grave. May they be reunited in Ilmater's grace.*

OpenHandTemple_KitchenPlaque_0.speaker: Narrator
OpenHandTemple_KitchenPlaque_0.text: *Kitchen. Visitors - kindly keep to common areas. Food will be served at mealtimes.*

Blackboard_DanthelonDancingAxe_001_0.speaker: Narrator
Blackboard_DanthelonDancingAxe_001_0.text: *All deliveries must be addressed to Danthelon - Shop Floor. The cellar is currently closed to the public.*

BlackboardPotionShop01_0.speaker: Narrator
BlackboardPotionShop01_0.text: *This season's hottest potions and ingredients now in-stock - get them while they last!*

BlackboardBlacksmithSecondFloor_0.speaker: Narrator
BlackboardBlacksmithSecondFloor_0.text: *Angleiron blades are EXTREMELY SHARP (obviously), and WILL CUT YOU if mishandled. YOU HAVE BEEN WARNED!!*

OpenHandTemple_Tombstone08_0.speaker: Narrator
OpenHandTemple_Tombstone08_0.text: *Geshan Kerkaros. Built the Open Hand Temple. Gave all in His name. We honour their life and legacy.*

OpenHandTemple_Tombstone03_0.speaker: Narrator
OpenHandTemple_Tombstone03_0.text: *Brilgor. Fell to a plot of the Absolute - dying without cause. May he find peace with Ilmater.*

OpenHandTemple_Tombstone03_1.speaker: Narrator
OpenHandTemple_Tombstone03_1.text: *Brilgor. Fell to anger and rage - taking Father Lorgan with him. May Ilmater forgive him.*

GortashOfficeBustPlaque_04_0.speaker: Narrator
GortashOfficeBustPlaque_04_0.text: *Founder of the Flaming Fist. Later history is kinder to him than accounts from his time, which portray him as a cruel and hard-handed mercenary commander.*

Blackboard_SharessCaress_04_0.speaker: Narrator
Blackboard_SharessCaress_04_0.text: *Apologies, but the 'Stern Librarian' is away. Upon her return, she expects clients on their knees, a list of their transgressions ready.*

BlackSmithBlackboard_0.speaker: Narrator
BlackSmithBlackboard_0.text: *If you see this sign, that means you are TOO CLOSE to Gyldro Angleiron. His work must NOT be interrupted.*

CarmsGarmStandingBlackboard_0.speaker: Narrator
CarmsGarmStandingBlackboard_0.text: *Enjoy our new collection of luxury sleepwear, 'Neverwinter Nighties'.*

BlacksmithHangingBlackBoard_0.speaker: Narrator
BlacksmithHangingBlackBoard_0.text: *This shopkeeper would like to remind everyone that Angleiron's crafts are the FINEST in the realms and worth EVERY COPPER.*

DanthelonDancingAxeDoorBlackboard_0.speaker: Narrator
DanthelonDancingAxeDoorBlackboard_0.text: *A hero is nothing without the right equipment. See Danthelon's Dancing Axe for all your adventuring needs!*

BlacksmithShopBlackBoard_0.speaker: Narrator
BlacksmithShopBlackBoard_0.text: *Welcome the Rivington General, home to crafts by the ILLUSTRIOUS Gyldro Angleiron!! Speak to his ASSISTANT ONLY as Gyldro is SUPER busy!*

GortashOfficeBustPlaque_05_0.speaker: Narrator
GortashOfficeBustPlaque_05_0.text: *Dame Amafrey, the Orphans' Friend, founded several orphanages in the Outer City, as the Lower City was no place for children (and the Upper City declined to sponsor an orphanage).*

OpenHandTemple_Tombstone02_0.speaker: Narrator
OpenHandTemple_Tombstone02_0.text: *Mikel Hornkiss. Gave all to the lepers. Fell to the malady himself. He is a beacon to us all.*
